turns.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Thank you for providing your zip code, Yusuf. I've verified your account successfully.

Regarding your request to return the cleaner (Vacuum Cleaner), headphones, and smartwatch from your recent delivered order (#W2378156 dated recently), I can assist with that. This order is eligible for return since it's in 'delivered' status. The items match as follows:

- Headphones (item ID: 4202497723, price: $342.81)
- Vacuum Cleaner (item ID: 4602305039, price: $561.05)
- Smart Watch (item ID: 9408160950, price: $381.26)

The total refund amount for these items would be $1,285.12, which will be processed back to your original payment method (Mastercard ending in 2478). It will take 5-7 business days for the refund to appear. The order status will change to 'return requested', and you'll receive an email with instructions on how and where to return these items. Note that the other items in this order (Mechanical Keyboard and Smart Thermostat) will remain unaffected.

Do you confirm that you want to proceed with returning these three items? Please reply with 'yes' or 'no'.

Separately, for your question about t-shirt options available in our online store, I'll need to look that up right away and get back to you in my next response.
Yes, please proceed with the return for those three items. And thanks—looking forward to hearing about the t-shirt options.
